extendedInfo.description: Word Breaker helps you play all of your favorite word puzzle games including Scrabble, Words with Friends, Wordsmith, Wordfeud, Words By Post, Crossword Puzzles and more!  The ultimate cheat when you're truly stuck.Features:-Supports the following games: Words with Friends, Angry Words, EA Scrabble, Wordfeud, Wordsmith, and Words By Post.-Lightning fast searches that include *all* of the results.  Unlike other "free" apps we don't hide the first 5 results from you!-All new Board Solver mode that will maximize your score.-Screenshot imports: import a screenshot directly into Board Solver mode.  Currently only works with Words with Friends on phone sized devices.  We're working on Wordfeud for a future release!-Exclusive "What's left in the bag" screen that shows you all of the tiles left in the bag.-Local dictionary (word definitions are accessed through the internet)-Quick launch button to get you back into your favorite word game fast!-Supports multiple dictionaries including ENABLE, SOWPODS, and TWL.-Supports blank tiles (wild cards).-Options to filter results based on length.-Move to SD card.What dictionary should you use?  It depends on the game, here's our recommendations:WWF: ENABLEAngry Words: ENABLEEA Scrabble: TWLWordfeud: TWLWordsmith: ENABLEWords By Post: TWLHaving trouble?  Checkout the Word Breaker support forum:http://www.firecrackersw.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=5Having trouble with ghost mode, try this:Installing the utility app "Auto Memory Manager" (https://market.android.com/details?id=com.lim.android.automemman&hl=en), and make the following changes:1) Selected the "Mild" settings.2) Increased the "Hidden Application" setting to 10MB.3) Power cycle your phone.Note: Firecracker Software LLC is not associated with the Auto Memory Manager app in any way.If you need help maximizing your score at Words With Friends get Word Breaker and then checkout the detailed help instructions at http://firecrackersw.com/apps/wordbreaker/word-breaker-instructions/.***Please email support@firecrackersw.com if you see a force close.  I strive to produce the highest quality apps and will move quickly to address any issues.  However, I can only fix the issues I know about.***This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc, makers of the popular game Words With Friends.

reviews.title: HANDS DOWN BEST APP FOR LETTER GAMES
reviews.comment: What can I say other than it works? Period. Across multiple platforms and will give you the best word combos everytime. Oh, and did I mention it is free??? Amazing.
reviews.author: Kelly Hendricks

reviews.comment: Cool App! Easy to use, great words, love it.
reviews.author: Sylvia Mata

reviews.title: Works well, but needs updating.
reviews.comment: The board solver mode is a  great help but the word vocabulary needs updating a bit. There were on occasions suggested words that are not accepted such as \"DI\" & \"DA\". Also, a few times a longer word could have been used that was not suggested at all. Other than that, I am very pleased with this app.
reviews.author: Jonathan Rudd

reviews.title: If you buy this app, play slows down a lot.
reviews.comment: I am not happy with the pay version. It is really slow.
reviews.author: L. Earl

reviews.comment: Did NOT work worth the time it took to download.  Use to love this app but not any longer.  Deleted.  Deleted.   Deleted...  enough said...\tDeleted deleted deleted.
reviews.author: Doris Foster

reviews.title: Never could win
reviews.comment: Very helpful never won a game until I found this app easy to use
reviews.author: Sharol Ritcherson

reviews.title: Great cheat and free
reviews.comment: Great app. Very useful cheat. Always works ;-)
reviews.author: Tracy M

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Good job, integrated well on my MyTouch 4g fit WWF.
reviews.author: JOHN HUMES

reviews.title: Last update
reviews.comment: Since the recent update, when I touch the cheat board anywhere it takes me directly to Playstore. It\'s very annoying. After a few tries it will work. If this persists I will have to uninstall it.
reviews.author: Irma Doornink

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great, mess around with the letters in the board until you find what\'s worth more, this app is helpful.
reviews.author: Jocelyn Alma

reviews.title: Broken (in a good way)
reviews.comment: Extremely useful, and terribly  unfair.
reviews.author: David Vann

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: Wonderful app, works everytime. Really helps me out in those tight spots. I recommend it to anyone who loves playing word games. I am buying the paid version to support these wonderful developers. Its actually worth it.
reviews.author: Ashlee Gonzalez

reviews.title: It\'s really good but......
reviews.comment: I love this app but can\'t figure out why it quit showing what points I was going to get for a word.
reviews.author: Erica Stewart

reviews.title: Not too bad
reviews.comment: Wish I could somehow set word length - or sort results according to length, for games such as 4 pics;  1 word.
reviews.author: Constance Cole

reviews.title: Bug  in app
reviews.comment: If you save a board solver without placing the green tiled suggested word and then start a new board, the green tiles will stay on the new board. Other than that, great app so far!
reviews.author: shawn hornaday

reviews.title: Great cheater when you can\'t make a word!
reviews.comment: Good help but sometimes when I search it goes to ads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice to have.
reviews.comment: It really comes in handy for those two or three letter words.
reviews.author: Beau Tukey

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I really like that it takes you back to the board game.
reviews.author: Teri McClanahan

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Awesome app! I use it more for a learning tool....or else it would not feel as  good to win. But, I love stumping my husband!!
reviews.author: Lisa Loertscher

reviews.title: A doddle to use
reviews.comment: Once I\'d figured out the app its a doddle to use and I have won just about every game ive played so far. People are starting to think I\'m a genius
reviews.author: ANDREW BACHE
